trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and specified the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 월드 변형을 곱하는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드에 의해 지정 된 매트릭스 앞에 추가 `matrix` 매개 변수, 결과 있도록 `matrix` 월드 변환을 x.

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 4 x&4; <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> 월드 변형을 곱하는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and specified the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 이 월드 변형을 곱하는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> 지정 된 순서로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 값이<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> 에 대 한는 `order` 곱하기의 순서는 매개 변수 지정 `matrix` 월드 변환을 x.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`.
trans-unit.target: 값이 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>에 대 한 `order` 곱하기의 순서 월드 변형을 x 임을 지정 `matrix`.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 4 x&4; <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> 월드 변형을 곱하는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that determines the order of the multiplication.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> 곱하기의 순서를 결정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scaling between world units and page units for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 전체 단위와이 대 한 페이지 단위 사이의 크기 조정을 가져오거나 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a value for the scaling between world units and page units for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에는 전체 단위와이 대 한 페이지 단위 사이의 크기 조정에 대 한 값 지정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 페이지 좌표에 사용 되는 측정 단위를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The graphics unit is the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 그래픽 장치는이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 의 페이지 좌표에 사용 되는 측정 단위

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> values other than <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> 이외의 값 <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: PageUnit is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>, which is not a physical unit.
trans-unit.target: PageUnit로 설정 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>, 물리적 단위 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value specifying how pixels are offset during rendering of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 렌더링 하는 동안 픽셀을 오프셋 하는 방법을 지정 하는 값을 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify either higher quality, slower rendering, or lower quality, faster rendering of the contents of this<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>object.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하거나 더 높은 품질, 느린 렌더링 또는 낮은 품질로 렌더링 속도 높여이 내용의 지정할<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"></xref> enumeration
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 멤버를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"> </xref> 열거형

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이전 호출에서 얻은 장치 컨텍스트 핸들을 해제는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>이 방식의 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>및 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>가져오고 Windows 장치에 대 한 핸들을 해제할 수 있도록 하는 두 가지가 있습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 호출을 항상 따라야 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>을 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>창 핸들 작업을 마친 후.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이전 호출에서 얻은 장치 컨텍스트 핸들을 해제는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>이 방식의 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 장치 컨텍스트는 기반의 Windows 구조 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 그래픽 개체 및 해당 관련된 특성으로 출력에 영향을 주는 그래픽 모드의 집합을 정의 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>이며 ReleaseHdc 메서드 쌍으로 표시 되어야 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 범위에 있는 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>ReleaseHdc 메서드 쌍을 일반적으로 하면 이러한 호출에만 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 함수.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 범위 하려고 한다는 점에서 호출 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 의 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>생성 되는 `hdc` 실패 하 고 매개 변수는 `ObjectBusy` 오류.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 또한 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 상태 변경 내용이 무시는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>의 `hdc` 후속 작업에서 매개 변수.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이전 호출에서 얻은 장치 컨텍스트에 대 한 핸들은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>이 방식의 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 장치 컨텍스트에 대 한 핸들을 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 장치 컨텍스트에 대 한 핸들입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering origin of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for dithering and for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의 렌더링 원점을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 디더링 및 빗금 브러시입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the dither origin for 8-bits-per-pixel and 16-bits-per-pixel dithering and is also used to set the origin for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> 구조 픽셀 당 8 비트 및 픽셀 당 16 비트 디더링의 디더링 원점을 나타내고 빗금 브러시의 원점을 설정 하는 데도 사용입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to an infinite region.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 다시 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 을 무한 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the clipping region of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is infinite, items that this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> draws are not clipped.
trans-unit.target: 때의 클립 영역을 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>무한,이 항목 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>그리기는 클리핑되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 이의 월드 변형 매트릭스를 다시 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 를 항등 매트릭스로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation.
trans-unit.target: 항등 매트릭스는 변환을 크기가, 회전 또는 변환으로 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Resetting the world transformation of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items.
trans-unit.target: 이의 월드 변형과 재설정 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>의미를 항등 매트릭스로의 월드 변형과 변형 된 항목의 기 하 도형을 변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Restores the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the state represented by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의 상태를 복원 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 가 나타내는 상태로 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>의 상태를 유지 하는 정보 블록이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>스택에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드가 반환 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>해당 정보 블록을 식별 하는.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to theRestore method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 전달 하는 경우 식별 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>theRestore 메서드에 정보 블록이 스택에서 제거 되 고 복원 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>시의 상태로에 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>에 지정된 된 호출에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>에 메서드를 한 번만 전달 될 수는 `Restore` 메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method several times before you call the Restore method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드는 중첩 될 수 있습니다; 즉, 호출할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>Restore 메서드를 호출 하기 전에 여러 번.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 호출할 때마다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>스택에 정보 블록이 놓입니다 메서드와 나타나면는 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>정보 블록에 대 한.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the Restore method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 중에서 개체 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드를 호출 하는 해당 특정 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> 반환</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> 시의 상태로 되돌아갑니다</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> Restore 메서드를 전달 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 하 여 스택에 정보 블록이 배치 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드 호출 스택에서 제거 되 고 그 후 해당 스택에 배치 하는 모든 정보 블록 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드 호출 또한 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드 위치 정보 블록 수에 대 한 호출으로 동일한 스택에 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a Restore call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 복원 하는 것 처럼 호출와 쌍을 이루는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>호출는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>은 메서드 호출을 이룹니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Restore method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 스택에 배치 Restore 메서드를 호출할 때 모든 정보 블록 (여는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드 또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드)를 호출 후는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드 스택에서 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>메서드를 스택에 배치 된 모든 정보 블록 (여는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>메서드 또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드)를 호출 후는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드 스택에서 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the state to which to restore this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>이 복원 하는 데에 상태를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 변환 매트릭스에 지정 된 회전을 적용 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 해당 요소에서 파생 되는 행렬의 변환 매트릭스의 회전 작업으로 구성 됩니다는 `angle` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 변형 매트릭스 앞에 추가 하 여 회전을 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 회전 각도로 각도입니다.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 변환 매트릭스에 지정 된 회전을 적용 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정 된 순서로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 해당 요소에서 파생 되는 행렬의 변환 매트릭스의 회전 작업으로 구성 됩니다는 `angle` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the rotation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 앞에 추가 하거나 추가의 변형 매트릭스는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>따라 회전 매트릭스는 `order` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 회전 각도로 각도입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the rotation is appended or prepended to the matrix transformation.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> 회전이 매트릭스 변환에 같고 추가 여부를 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and identifies the saved state with a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의 현재 상태를 저장 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 로 저장된 된 상태를 식별 하 고는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Save method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Save 메서드를 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>의 상태를 유지 하는 정보 블록이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>스택에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The Save method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: Save 메서드 반환는 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>해당 정보 블록을 식별 하는.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call.
trans-unit.target: 전달 하는 경우 식별 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>에 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>메서드가, 정보 블록이 스택에서 제거 되 고 복원 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>상태로 시점의 Save 메서드 호출의 시간.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the Save method can be passed only once to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>에 메서드를 한 번만 전달 하 고 저장을 지정된 된 호출에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the Save method can be nested; that is, you can call the Save method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Save 메서드를 호출 하는 중첩 될 수 있습니다. 즉, 호출할 수 있습니다 Save 메서드 여러 번 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the Save method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Save 메서드를 호출할 때마다 정보 블록이 스택에 배치 되 고 나타나면는<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> 정보 블록에 대 한.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>메서드 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>는 해당 특정 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> 를 반환 하는 저장 메서드 호출 시의 상태로 되돌아갑니다</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> 를 전달 하는 경우 그 중 하나

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that Save method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that Save method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 정보 블록이 있는지 Save 메서드를 호출 스택에서 제거 되 고 모든 정보 블록을 Save 메서드 호출 또한 제거 후 해당 스택에 배치 하 여 스택에 배치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the Save method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>Save 메서드 호출으로 동일한 스택에 메서드 내부 정보 블록.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> call is paired with a Save call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 과 마찬가지로 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>호출 쌍으로 저장 호출으로는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>은 메서드 호출을 이룹니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드 호출.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the Save method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>메서드를 스택에 배치 된 모든 정보 블록 (Save 메서드 또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드) 해당 Save 메서드 호출 스택에서 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>메서드를 스택에 배치 된 모든 정보 블록 (Save 메서드 또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드)를 호출 후의 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>메서드 스택에서 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the saved state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 반환 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref> 이 저장된 된 상태를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 이 변형 매트릭스에 지정된 된 크기 조정 작업을 적용 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 개체의 변형 매트릭스를 앞에 추가 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 요소가 대각선 행렬으로 변환 매트릭스 크기 조정 작업으로 구성 됩니다 (`sx`, `sy`, 1).

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 변형 매트릭스 앞에 추가 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>에 크기 조정 매트릭스입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: X 방향의 배율입니다.

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 방향의 배율입니다.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 이 변형 매트릭스에 지정된 된 크기 조정 작업을 적용 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정 된 순서로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 요소가 대각선 행렬으로 변환 매트릭스 크기 조정 작업으로 구성 됩니다 (`sx`, `sy`, 1).

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 앞에 추가 하거나 추가의 변형 매트릭스는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>에 따라 크기 조정 매트릭스는 `order` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: X 방향의 배율입니다.

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 방향의 배율입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the scaling operation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> 크기 조정 작업이 변형 매트릭스에 추가 되거나 앞에 추가 하는지 여부를 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 으로 표시 되는 그래픽 경로 `path` 매개 변수 닫혀 있지 않으면 추가 세그먼트가 추가 됩니다 마지막 점에서 하 고 첫 번째 경로를 닫습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>새 클립 영역을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""></xref> property of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 에 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""> </xref> 는 지정 된 속성 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from which to take the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>새 클립 영역을 되려면입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 으로 지정 된 사각형에는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>새 클립 영역을 나타내는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 으로 지정 된 사각형에는 <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>새 클립 영역을 나타내는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 현재 클립 영역과 지정 된 결합 하는 지정 된 작업의 결과로 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 으로 표시 되는 그래픽 경로 `path` 매개 변수 닫혀 있지 않으면 추가 세그먼트가 추가 됩니다 마지막 점에서 하 고 첫 번째 경로를 닫습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>결합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> 결합 작업을 사용 하 여 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified combining operation of the current clip region and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip*> property of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 는 지정 된 결과를 결합 현재 클립 영역과 작업 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip*>는 지정 된 속성 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip*>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that specifies the clip region to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>결합할 클립 영역을 지정 하는.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> 결합 작업을 사용 하 여 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 현재 클립 영역과 지정 된 사각형을 결합 하는 지정 된 작업의 결과에 <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>결합 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> 결합 작업을 사용 하 여 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 현재 클립 영역과 지정 된 사각형을 결합 하는 지정 된 작업의 결과에 <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>결합 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> 결합 작업을 사용 하 여 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 설정 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 현재 클립 영역과 지정 된 결합 하는 지정 된 작업의 결과로 <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>결합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Member from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> 결합 작업을 사용 하 여 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering quality for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 렌더링 품질을 가져오거나 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing).
trans-unit.target: 다듬기 모드 선, 곡선 및 채워진 영역의 가장자리 사용 다듬기 (앤티앨리어싱) 여부를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode.
trans-unit.target: 한 가지 예외는 경로 그라데이션 브러시 다듬기 모드를 준수 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Areas filled using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the SmoothingMode property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 채워진 영역은 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>SmoothingMode 속성에 관계 없이 동일한 방식으로 (별칭) 렌더링 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gamma correction value for rendering text.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 렌더링에 대 한 감마 보정 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value must be between 0 and 12.
trans-unit.target: 감마 보정 값은 0에서 12 사이 여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 4입니다.

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value used for rendering antialiased and ClearType text.
trans-unit.target: 렌더링 앤티 앨리어싱된 ClearType 텍스트에 사용 되는 감마 보정 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering mode for text associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연결 된 텍스트의 렌더링 모드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The text rendering hint specifies whether text renders with antialiasing.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 렌더링 힌트 텍스트 앤티앨리어싱과 함께 렌더링할지 여부를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should not use a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> when the TextRenderingHint property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> TextRenderingHint 속성이 설정 된 경우</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> 의 속성 값</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A> 을 사용 하지 않아야

trans-unit.source: An exception could occur or the image may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 예외가 발생할 수 있습니다 또는 이미지가 제대로 렌더링 되지 않을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric world transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 기하학적 월드 변형의 복사본을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device.
trans-unit.target: GDI +-세 좌표 공간을 사용 하는 중: 세계, 페이지 및 장치입니다.

trans-unit.source: World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 세계 좌표 모델링할 특정 그래픽 영역을 사용 하는 좌표 및 좌표를.NET Framework의 메서드에 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 좌표 폼 또는 컨트롤 등의 그리기 화면에서 사용 하는 좌표계를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer.
trans-unit.target: 장치 좌표는 화면 또는 프린터와 같은 항목이 그려지는 물리적 장치에서 사용 하는 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Transform 속성 세계 좌표 페이지 좌표를 매핑하는 전역 변환을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 반환 하는 매트릭스 변형으로 속성은 기하학적 변환의 복사본을 삭제 해야 행렬의 더 이상 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the geometric world transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복사본은 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> 이 대 한 기하학적 월드 변형을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Transforms an array of points from one coordinate space to another using the current world and page transformations of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 변형 한 좌표 공간에서 현재 월드 및 페이지 변형을 사용 하 여 점의 배열을 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the destination coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> 대상 좌표 공간을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the source coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> 원본 좌표 공간을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points to transformation.
trans-unit.target: 배열 <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> 변환할 점을 나타내는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Transforms an array of points from one coordinate space to another using the current world and page transformations of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 변형 한 좌표 공간에서 현재 월드 및 페이지 변형을 사용 하 여 점의 배열을 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the destination coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> 대상 좌표 공간을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the source coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> 원본 좌표 공간을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represent the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: 배열 <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> 변형할 점을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by specified amounts in the horizontal and vertical directions.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 변환 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 가로 및 세로 방향으로 지정 된 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 번역의 x 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 y 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by specified amounts in the horizontal and vertical directions.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 변환 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 가로 및 세로 방향으로 지정 된 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 번역의 x 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 y 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by prepending the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 지정 된 이동을 변환 매트릭스 앞에 추가 하 여 좌표계의 원점을 변경 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 원점은 그리기 화면의 왼쪽 위 모서리 일반적으로 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 변환 작업으로 이동 하는 행렬의 변환 매트릭스 이루어져는 `dx` 및 `dy` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 변환 매트릭스를 변형 매트릭스 앞에 추가 하 여 번역을 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 번역의 x 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 y 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by applying the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 이 변형 매트릭스에 지정된 된 이동을 적용 하 여 좌표계의 원점을 변경 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 지정 된 순서로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 변환 작업으로 이동 하는 행렬의 변환 매트릭스 이루어져는 `dx` 및 `dy` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 앞에 추가 하거나 추가의 변형 매트릭스는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>에 따라 변환 매트릭스는 `order` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 번역의 x 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 y 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the translation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> 번역 변형 매트릭스에 추가 되거나 미리 추가 하는지 여부를 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 표시 되는 클립 영역 경계 사각형을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 단위 결과 사각형에 의해 지정 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>속성.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: 기본 단위는 픽셀입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>일반적으로 컨트롤과 연결 된 해당 컨트롤의 클라이언트 영역에 상대적인 사각형의 시작 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: 표시 된 클립 영역이이의 클립 영역에 공통 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>및 창의 클립 영역.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> 이 표시 되는 클립 영역에 대 한 경계 사각형을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>합니다.
